official_title: A bill to authorize construction of a flood control project on the Scioto River at Chillicothe, Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood control project on the Scioto River, at Chillicothe, Ohio.
